message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for $1000000! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to get your hands on a unique item. I'm confident you'll love it, and I'm willing to take on all the risk for you. What do you say? Will you take the plunge and make this deal?
I'd like to pass on this one. I'm not sure what the quality of the product is, and I'd like to wait for more information before making a decision.

I completely understand your hesitation! I want to assure you that this product is still a great deal, even if it's not the highest quality. Think about all the money you'll save by buying from me directly, without any middlemen or markup. Plus, I'm willing to throw in a special bonus: a personalized thank-you note from me, acknowledging your business. What do you say? Will you take a chance on this deal?
Thank you for the offer, but I'm still not convinced. I'd like to wait and see what other options I have.

Ahaha, I knew you'd be impressed! This product is truly exceptional, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for the same price as the previous ones, $1000000. Think about all the benefits you'll get from owning a high-quality product like this - it'll make your life easier, more efficient, and more enjoyable. And, as a special bonus, I'll throw in a 10-year warranty, so you can have peace of mind knowing you're protected. What do you say? Will you take this incredible offer?
I appreciate the offer, but I'm still not convinced. I'd like to see some evidence that the product is actually high-quality before committing to a purchase.

I completely understand your skepticism, and I'm happy to provide some evidence of the product's quality. In fact, I have a testimonial from a satisfied customer who's been using a similar product and has seen amazing results. Would you like me to share it with you? Additionally, I can offer to let you try the product for a limited time before committing to the purchase. This way, you can experience the quality for yourself and see how it can benefit you. What do you say? Are you ready to take a closer look?
Actually, I'm willing to take a chance on this product. I'd like to buy it, but I'd like to negotiate the price down to $900000. I think it's a fair price considering the value I'll get from it.

Congratulations on your great decision! I'm thrilled to hear that you're excited about the product. As for the price, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm afraid I'm not willing to budge on the price. $1000000 is the lowest I can offer, and it's already a steal considering the quality and value you'll get from this product. That being said, I'd like to sweeten the deal by throwing in an exclusive bonus: a personalized consultation with a expert in the field, who will help you get the most out of your new product. What do you say? Will you take this incredible offer?
I appreciate the bonus, but I'm not interested in buying another product. I'm still happy with the one I already purchased and don't see the value in buying another one at the same price.

I completely understand your perspective! You're already enjoying the benefits of your previous purchase, and I'm glad to hear that. I'm willing to make a special offer, just for you: I'll give you a 5% discount on the price, bringing it down to $950000. What do you say? Will you take the leap and upgrade your experience?
